scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Pillsbury requests copies of four poems; questions the use of poetry in a nation threatened by war; and thanks Thoreau for a parcel and letter.

did.unittitle: Parker Pillsbury to Henry David Thoreau 1861 Apr 9

scopecontent.p: Requests copies of "Memoirs," "id est," "in the Woods" and "on the Rivers" for a friend. Questions the use of poetry while the country is threatened by War. Refers to Ralph Waldo Emerson and Amos Bronson Alcott.

did.unittitle: P. P. to H. D. T. 1861 Apr 13

scopecontent.p: Thanks for the parcel and letter.
